entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 except minus 24 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 24 inland. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 23 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14 except minus 23 inland. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12 except minus 24 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12 except minus 24 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 19 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
